Title: Relates to creating NYCHA-based health centers
Summary: Relates to creating NYCHA-based health centers to provide basic health services for residents living on NYCHA campuses, specifically specialty care and testing for lead poisoning and mold exposure and specifically respiratory related illnesses.
LawCode: Add ยง411, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to creating NYCHA-based health centers
